__e: If you boys will, please follow me. I have something I'd like to showyou.
Um- It's, uh-it's not my house, obviously, and it's not my party, but if I could just have your attention for a second.
I could use some help with a few things and if they can help me there, you know, I should go there.
If you'll kindly take a seat in the waiting room, the doctor and I will finish up and be with you shortly.
I'm delusional. I'm making the finger sandwiches. and they're all giving me the finger.
And maybe, just maybe, if any of you can look yourselves in the mirror and know that you've been half as good a friend to someone else as Gus has been to me,

I know that you want to do everything you can to find your children, but the best thing you can do right now is to make sure we have all of your contact information in case the kidnappers call any of you directly.
I don't have anything material to leave behind for you, but the people I've come to know over the course of my life will do their best to help you get along.
They're gonna do everything that they can to keep your family safe from your father.
It's their last attempt, and that's why they're just trying to get anything they can and do whatever they can.
If this works, get out of here as fast as you can. And spare me a thought now and then.
